Great! I found the issue. Looking at the git log, I can see the problematic change. In the first diff shown, there was a change from:

```python
elif isinstance(args[0], (HDUList, TableHDU, BinTableHDU, GroupsHDU)):
    return True
else:
    return False
```

to:

```python
return isinstance(args[0], (HDUList, TableHDU, BinTableHDU, GroupsHDU))
```

This change removed the safety check and now directly tries to access `args[0]` without checking if `args` has any elements.
